AnalystsTest.Text:
3/2/2013 2:38:54 PM
Write briefly about yourself before you proceed with the Test Topic.

This is Venkateshwarlu, an MCA graduate, having overall experience of about 6 years in the ITES industry, handling various positions based on companys requirements.  Worked as an Operations Head with Sohum Tech Solutions, handling a group of 10-15 members.  My responsibilities include communicating with the client for any issues, updates, work allocations, etc.  Based on expertise, will identify the team members and allocate work and ensure the work is completed within the Turn-Around-Time with quality. Participating and attending weekly and monthly meetings with the client, etc.  Worked as a Quality Analyst/Proof Reader/ Editor with Vision Infonet for almost 5 years, handling various tasks and positions.  As a Quality Analyst, i keep monitoring the files done by my team members and check their quality and client specifications by randomly picking up the files and updating them with respect to their errors or issues they are having.  I will also handle the new clients by myself, where i will do the trial runs by myself until the client feels satisfied with the quality.  Also, i will edit the files with voice for any mistakes or errors or for any client specification issues.  I have been a responsible person for the feedback from the client.


Does India hold the potential to become next Economic Superpower? Elaborate with facts.
India has very good resources, market, potential, skilled people to become next Economic Superpower.  Now a days, we see Indians who are working in other countries are making wonders and helping that country to grow in every aspect.  Here in India, we have everything, but the problem is with the system.  If the system is in a rightful manner, then everything will be in order. 

In the earlier days, if you see singapore, it is a very poor country with very less emminities.  Now it is one of the big city and place with all the world class facilities and emminities, which one cannot think of, because there everything is accountable and system is strict about the rules they follow, whereas here in India, we do have rules, but the politicians here break them, so we do not have a proper system. It is only meant to papers and for common man.    

  These days, we see lots of scams by the political leaders and their relatives.  We also see that the major companies are held by these people only.  Now a days, there is no space or room for common man to try or even think about what is going on, because he is debt with full of worries.  Everything in every aspect it is growing in a negative manner causing only destruction and loss.

We have a lot of black money in the market, everyone knows about it, every politician and government servent is aware of it.  if we can get that money out, we can help our country grow in every aspect, it can be either in terms of poverty, literacy, or financial crisis, etc.  We can use those things or funds for the welfare of the poor people by giving work, education, houses, helping them to grow with the country.  What i feel is if one is educated, he can think of what is good and what is ba
